snippet.title: Shadow of the Colossus HD - Gameplay Trailer [HD] (PS3)
snippet.description:
If you want to buy The ICO and Shadow of the Colossus Collection: http://amzn.to/ICOandShadow

The Japanese gameplay trailer for the upcoming HD collection for Shadow of the Colossus on the Playstation 3. Shadow of the Colossus HD is one part of 'The ICO and Shadow of the Colossus Collection'.

Shadow of the Colossus is a majestic journey through ancient lands. With your trusty horse at your side, you'll explore spacious lands and unearth anicent monsters called Colossus. Armed with your wits, a sword and a bow, use cunning and strategy to topple each of these behemoths.

Look forward to our complete 'The ICO and Shadow of the Colossus Collection' walkthrough and 'The ICO and Shadow of the Colossus Collection' review.

Hope you enjoy. Please rate and subscribe.

Developer: Team Ico
Publisher: Sony Computer Entertainment
